channel.title: Whatever Happened to Bob?
channel.description: Just reading Ben's blog. He has been playing with 2D Fractal Terrains (as you do). Seeing the landscape Ben generated instantly brought back so many memories. A school friend of mine, called Robert Parsons, used a similar algorithm to generate...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description:
> He was the first hacker I met that I knew was better than me.
I hang around on the Debian and GNOME lists, so I'm well aware there are many many better than I am! ;-)
Nice post.
item.dc:creator: Ben

item.title: Comment by Tom+00:00
item.description: Look on friends re-uninited for this guy?
item.dc:creator: Tom
